vildflora.title: Vildflora/Uendelig Hav
vildflora.description:
An EP that has grown out of various inspiration/experiences the last year. But as always with this project, getting the majority of inspiration and influence from nature, in particular the Norwegian scenery that surrounds me.

The title means in Norwegian "endless ocean". Referring to the vast oceans and the feeling/state of mind that arises in me near the ocean, especially these views where the ocean seems to go on endlessly.

Released March 24, 2023

infinite.title: Infinite
infinite.description:
On Infinite you’ll notice a subtle gain in intensity in all three tracks. Although being far from peak time monsters, the aim here is undoubtedly to entrance a focused dancefloor, preferably while the sun is rising. Whether it’s the Eden-like atmosphere of “Cascade”, the introverted broken beats of “Infinite” or the meaty trance of “Pathos” that will guide the crowd through the morning session is only a matter of circumstances and taste.

Released October 23, 2023 on Navigare Audio

mutabor.title: Mutabor
mutabor.description:
As in a long-forgotten fairy tale, Mutabor transforms you like a magical spell. With this outing, sound wizard Hydrous pushes the boundaries of deep hypnotism into uncharted territories full of bewitching sounds and epic atmospheres, which will alter your mind and purify your soul. Di.Capa and The Alchemical Theory are in for additional hexing sessions which bend reality to a whole new level.

Released June 7, 2024 on Charybdis
